name: I want to verify response data of bingo games
id: testing-bingo-games-features-of-virgin-games:I want to verify response data of bingo games

testSteps.description: Given I am on virgin games bingo field
When I send Get request to the Lobby feed endpoint

testSteps.description: Then I get valid status code 200
And I verify that the stream name is "BloxBingoVirgin" at streams index
